title: Our productive industry
creator_credit: Pat Dowling and Pat Dowling Pictures
brief_description: Explains that the modern system of mass production and transportation provides large quantities of industrial products for consumers. Stresses the inter-dependence of various industries. Compares old water-powered mills and modern power sources. Shows the first mass produced musket and one of the earliest automobiles in operation.
